arts.ttl: Shrewsbury captain John Marquis equals record for quickest red card
arts.sum: The striker was sent off after just 13 seconds in the loss at Peterborough.

arts.ttl: Shrewsbury captain John Marquis matches record for fastest red card
arts.sum: Former goalkeeper Kevin Pressman was sent off after 13 seconds for Sheffield Wednesday in 2000.

arts.ttl: Tributes flood in for 'remarkable' woman who was much-loved and integral part of Shrewsbury Town FC
arts.sum: A statement from the club said: "Shrewsbury Town are heartbroken to announce our much-loved staff member Pam Coe has passed away following a short battle with cancer. "A woman who truly loved Shrewsbury Town, she was the first person players, staff and officials met on a home matchday.

arts.ttl: Preview: Peterborough United vs. Shrewsbury Town - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Peterborough United and Shrewsbury Town, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
